data.title: God Provides™ ... A Film Learning Experience from Crown Financial Ministries
data.meta_description: God Provides™: A Film Learning Experience from Crown Financial Ministries.
data.text:
Russian Translation Status

Work on the Russian translation of God Provides™ will begin this fall, and we hope to complete it by the end of 2010. The Russian language project will be done in Kiev, Ukraine.

The Russian language has 164 million primary speakers and 114 million secondary speakers. It's the official language in 9 nations.

Give

You can donate to help Crown teach others the Biblical principles of finances that will transform their lives for God's kingdom. Click here to donate online. In Step 2, be sure to scroll down and choose the God Provides™ category of your choice.
